instructions.title: How To Delete Your Bumble Account
instructions.before: Just deleting the bumble app from your device does not delete your account.  If you want to delete your bumble Account for real you must navigate to the settings page on your mobile device.
instructions.after: However, since Bumble account is linked to your Facebook account, you must take an extra step after deleting it.  You need to break the link between Facebook and Bumble by removing third party access to your bumble account from facebook.
thingsToRemember: To delete an account is to remove the profile completely so people cannot see it or swipe on it. It does mean you will have to start over if you want to get back in the game but in the meantime, it does mean peace and quiet.
Removed and Deleted information may persist in backup copies for up to 30 Days to enable restoration of account, but it will not be available to others in the meantime.
If you no longer wish to receive push notifications/alerts from the App, you may opt out by changing your notification settings on your mobile device, you do not need to delete your whole account.

If you have subscribed to Bumble Boost, you will need to stop the payment from the Google Play Store or iTunes otherwise you will still be charged. Both stores have a subscriptions section that should list Bumble. Select it and cancel the subscription.

steps: Click Profile Icon on Top Left
Select Settings and Scroll to the Bottom
Select Why you are Deleting your Account
Type ‘Delete’ into the box when prompted then Select Confirm

instructions.title: How To Remove Third Party Access From Bumble
instructions.before: Since Bumble account is linked to your Facebook account, you must take an extra step after deleting it.  You need to break the link between Facebook and Bumble by removing third party access to your bumble account from facebook.
instructions.after: Remember, you must delete your bumble account from the settings page in the app in addition to removing third party access from facebook.

steps: Tap the three bars on the bottom right
Scroll down to Settings and Privacy
Select Bumble and then Tap Remove to delink app
A screen will appear that says Bumble Removed to Confirm Deletion
